contents.text:
Student email: student@example.com
Study plan:
{"rationale":"The weekly milestones sequence hands-on development first, then reinforce by layering in foundational concepts and alternate approaches (low-code and cloud integration). The plan starts with practical .NET chat app development, as the template serves as both a capstone and a reference for small iterations. Once the end-to-end flow is established, coverage expands to prompt engineering, rapid prototyping in other stacks, AI service integration, and UI/UX with Power Apps. Complex or time-consuming modules (like end-to-end app build) are spread over multiple sessions. Each week ends with a checkpoint for review or further hands-on experimentation, ensuring steady skills progression, retention, and readiness for deployment.","planTitle":"Generative AI Chat App Builder (8-Week Intensive)","durationWeeks":8,"weeklyHours":6,"weeklyMilestones":[{"weekNumber":1,"objective":"Familiarize yourself with generative AI chat app principles and set up the development environment.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Read 'Generative AI solutions for developers – Overview' (https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/developer/ai/introduction-build-generative-ai-solutions)","Skim sample app architectures"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Install .NET SDK, Visual Studio Code, and required AI SDKs/tools","Review prerequisites for AI app quickstart"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Walk through and bookmark 'Create .NET AI app...' quickstart steps 1-2 (https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app)"]}],"checkpoint":"Able to describe main components/architecture of a generative chat app and have the dev environment ready."},{"weekNumber":2,"objective":"Build the minimal viable AI chat app using the .NET template.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Follow .NET AI app quickstart steps 3-4 (chat service creation, document sources setup)"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Complete quickstart steps 5-6 (vector search setup, embedding models)"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Run/test the app locally, experiment with responses"]}],"checkpoint":"App launches and supports basic chat on local dev machine."},{"weekNumber":3,"objective":"Deepen understanding of adding custom data, embeddings, and prompt engineering.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Review documentation on document ingestion, chunking, and embeddings in the .NET AI quickstart"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Experiment: Add new custom documents and test retrieval quality"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Read 'Generative AI solutions for developers – Prompt Engineering' section"]}],"checkpoint":"Successfully query across new content and explain prompt engineering basics."},{"weekNumber":4,"objective":"Refactor/extend the chat app: advanced features, code review, error handling.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Add logging and error handling to your AI chat app; experiment with response formatting"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Review code, clean up and document your app","Share early feedback with a peer or instructor"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Optional: Try changing the LLM model or fine-tuning prompts based on review feedback"]}],"checkpoint":"Improved/stable chat app with clearer structure and more robust handling."},{"weekNumber":5,"objective":"Explore rapid prototyping with Power Apps for chat interfaces (low-code option).","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Start module: 'Build a Power Apps component' (https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-power-apps-component/)","Complete intro and component basics"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue with creating custom UI/component steps for chat"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Review and test your Power Apps chat interface"]}],"checkpoint":"Functional chat UI prototype using Power Apps components."},{"weekNumber":6,"objective":"Design for mobile and cross-device performance in chat apps.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Start 'Build a mobile-optimized app from Power Apps' module","Focus on adaptation for chat UI and navigation"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Continue and finish mobile-optimization exercises"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Test your Power Apps chat app on different devices or form factors","Document UX lessons"]}],"checkpoint":"Mobile-optimized Power Apps chat app with design notes."},{"weekNumber":7,"objective":"Integrate Azure AI Services with your chat solution and experiment with Copilot Studio.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Begin module: 'Use Azure AI Services for Language in Copilot Studio' (https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cognitive-service-power-virtual-agents/)"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Follow integration lab for Azure AI Service, connecting to your chat prototype"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Deploy/test the integrated solution and note differences from code-first UI"]}],"checkpoint":"Azure service integration validated and compared with manual .NET approach."},{"weekNumber":8,"objective":"Consolidate, deploy, and document your generative AI chat app solution.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Review all codebases, summarize similarities and differences (Power Apps vs .NET)"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Prepare deployment: publish your preferred chat app (choose .NET or Power Apps) to cloud or internal server"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Write a short self-assessment and future enhancement roadmap"]}],"checkpoint":"Live app deployed; written summary and next steps plan complete."}],"briefMessageToUser":"This plan focuses on hands-on experience, gradually introducing essential concepts and alternate platforms. Dedicate each session to practical, incremental progress—by the end, you'll have both a functional chat app and the foundational skills to adapt, scale, or deploy AI-driven chat solutions in the real world. Stick with it every week, and you'll be ahead of the curve in generative AI applications!"}

Produce JSON only matching the provided schema

{"rationale":"This engagement plan is carefully mapped to the student's intensive 8-week hands-on generative AI chat app builder journey, aligning each reminder with scheduled tasks and accompanying official Microsoft Learn resources, reinforcing a practical and incremental approach to mastery.","recipientEmail":"student@example.com","reminders":[{"schedule":"2024-06-10T09:00:00","subject":"Kick off Week 1: Get Inspired by Generative AI Solutions","body":"Start strong by exploring the principles of generative AI chat apps and sample architectures; read the Microsoft overview for essential context.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/developer/ai/introduction-build-generative-ai-solutions"},{"schedule":"2024-06-12T09:00:00","subject":"Set Up for Success: Prepare Your .NET AI Development Environment","body":"Stay on track by installing the .NET SDK and essential tools—review quickstart prerequisites to ensure your environment is ready for app development.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-14T09:00:00","subject":"Dive In: Begin the .NET AI App Quickstart – Steps 1-2","body":"Walk through steps 1-2 of the .NET AI app quickstart, starting your foundational hands-on journey—bookmark these for easy reference.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-17T09:00:00","subject":"Build Your First AI Chat App: Complete Steps 3-4","body":"Keep building momentum by following steps 3-4 of the quickstart to create your chat service and configure document sources.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-19T09:00:00","subject":"Power Up: Set Up Vector Search and Embeddings – Steps 5-6","body":"Boost your app's intelligence by completing steps 5-6 to set up vector search and deploy embedding models for improved data retrieval.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-21T09:00:00","subject":"Test Drive: Run Your AI Chat App Locally","body":"See your work in action—run and test your AI app locally, experimenting with responses for hands-on learning.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-24T09:00:00","subject":"Customize and Control: Learn Document Ingestion and Embeddings","body":"Deepen your foundation by reviewing documentation on adding custom data, document chunking, and embedding strategies in the .NET AI quickstart.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-26T09:00:00","subject":"Experiment and Explore: Add Custom Documents","body":"Expand your skills by integrating new custom documents into your AI app and testing their impact on data retrieval quality.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-06-28T09:00:00","subject":"Sharpen Your Prompts: Master Prompt Engineering Basics","body":"Build prompting prowess by reading the Prompt Engineering section—gain techniques to guide and optimize AI chat responses.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/developer/ai/introduction-build-generative-ai-solutions#prompt-engineering"},{"schedule":"2024-07-01T09:00:00","subject":"Enhance Your App: Add Logging and Error Handling","body":"Elevate your chat app by implementing logging, error handling, and experimenting with response formatting for a more robust experience.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-07-03T09:00:00","subject":"Refine and Share: Review and Document Your AI App","body":"Take time to review, clean up, and document your app—sharing early feedback sets you up for even greater improvement.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-07-05T09:00:00","subject":"Iterate and Advance: Experiment with Models and Prompts","body":"Push your skills further by swapping out the LLM model or tweaking prompts based on your previous feedback for advanced effects.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-07-08T09:00:00","subject":"Explore Low-Code: Start Building Power Apps Components","body":"Start the Power Apps component module to broaden your UI options; complete the intro and basics for flexible chat app interfaces.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-power-apps-component/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-10T09:00:00","subject":"Advance in Power Apps: Create Custom UI Components","body":"Continue building custom UI/components in Power Apps to prototype a tailored chat interface—your progress unlocks new possibilities.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-power-apps-component/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-12T09:00:00","subject":"Validate Your Power Apps Chat UI","body":"Review and test your Power Apps chat interface to ensure functionality and user experience—be proud of your growing versatility.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-power-apps-component/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-15T09:00:00","subject":"Design for Mobility: Start Mobile-Optimized Power Apps Module","body":"Begin designing for mobile by working through the Power Apps module focused on mobile-optimized chat UI and navigation.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-mobile-optimized-app-powerapps/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-17T09:00:00","subject":"Complete and Polish Your Mobile Chat App","body":"Finish mobile-optimization exercises to ensure your chat app works smoothly across devices—your attention to detail matters.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-mobile-optimized-app-powerapps/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-19T09:00:00","subject":"Cross-Device Testing: Ensure UX Quality","body":"Test your Power Apps chat app across devices and capture key UX insights for future refinement.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/build-mobile-optimized-app-powerapps/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-22T09:00:00","subject":"Connect AI Services: Start Azure AI for Copilot Module","body":"Expand your capabilities by starting the Azure AI Services for Language in Copilot Studio module and see broader AI integration strategies.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cognitive-service-power-virtual-agents/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-24T09:00:00","subject":"Integrate Azure AI: Hands-On Lab with Your Chat App","body":"Gain real-world skills by following the integration lab to connect Azure AI Service to your chat prototype.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cognitive-service-power-virtual-agents/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-26T09:00:00","subject":"Deploy and Compare: Test Your Integrated Chat App","body":"Deploy and test the Azure-integrated chat solution and note key differences from your earlier .NET approach—compare, learn, evolve.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cognitive-service-power-virtual-agents/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-29T09:00:00","subject":"Recap and Reflect: Review Codebases and Approaches","body":"Review all codebases and summarize the strengths and differences between Power Apps and .NET solutions—insight builds mastery.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-07-31T09:00:00","subject":"Launch: Prepare and Publish Your Chat App","body":"Prepare for deployment—publish your chosen chat app to a cloud or internal server as a major project milestone.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"},{"schedule":"2024-08-02T09:00:00","subject":"Reflect and Plan: Write Your Self-Assessment and Roadmap","body":"Wrap up with a self-assessment and roadmap for future enhancements—celebrate how far you’ve come and lay a path forward!","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates#create-the-net-ai-app"}],"motivationMessages":[{"schedule":"2024-06-10T08:30:00","body":"You’re at the start of an exciting journey! Every hands-on session moves you closer to building real-world generative AI solutions—keep your eyes on the goal."},{"schedule":"2024-06-21T10:00:00","body":"One week down—your foundation is set! Celebrate these early wins and prepare to build even more powerful apps next week."},{"schedule":"2024-07-05T09:30:00","body":"Awesome progress! Each iteration is making your chat app smarter and your development skills sharper. Keep experimenting and improving."},{"schedule":"2024-07-19T09:30:00","body":"Cross-device access is a major skill—testing and refining user experience sets great developers apart. Your hard work is paying off!"},{"schedule":"2024-08-02T10:00:00","body":"Congratulations on completing the program! Your new skills make you ready to lead projects and innovate in generative AI—be proud and stay curious."}],"briefMessageToUser":"Your 8-week plan pairs hands-on practice with foundational learning—dive into each session, use these reminders and links, and watch your skills (and chat apps) grow week by week. Consistency now leads to mastery later!"}
